subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Auriemma reached the mark faster than any other college coach, requiring 1,034 games, and is tied with Jody Conradt for fifth on the career list for women’s coaches.
snippet: Auriemma reached the mark faster than any other college coach, requiring 1,034 games, and is tied with Jody Conradt for fifth on the career list for women’s coaches.
